title: HUGE fps drop since last patch
body:
Hello, I used to play LoL on decent 60fps on medium settings,
Yes my pc specs are so poor, intel pentium 2120U 1.9GHz with 4GB RAM and Intel HD 4000
It was all good until last patch when my fps dropped to low 15 average
I tried literally EVERY SOLUTION
-ALT+Enter+boderless mode
-Lower graphics to low
-Lower resolution to even 400x600
NOTHING WORKED, no matter what resolution or graphics, I'm still having that 15fps
Thanks RIOT, just in the beginning of summer!!

replies.body: I've been having similar issues too :(

Some of those steps have a potential to help improve fps drops due to pc stress, but there could be other factors here like outdated drivers or even bad game files.  My suggestion here would be to run through every step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out possibilities as well as tune up your PC's health.  Hopefully, that will smooth things out for you!
